    • 方法详细资料

      • bindViewHolder

        public void bindViewHolder(android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder)
        Updates the views in the ViewHolder with information from the Device object.

        Derived classes should override this method to set up a ViewHolder for display in RecyclerViews.

        覆盖:
        bindViewHolder 在类中 ViewModel
        参数:
        holder - The view holder for this object

      • getItemViewType

        public int getItemViewType()
        Returns an integer representing the item view type for this device. This method is called when displaying a CardView representing this device. The item view type should be different for each type of CardView displayed for a device.

        The value returned from this method will be passed to the (android.view.ViewGroup, int) method of the ViewModelProvider object, which uses it to determine the appropriate ViewHolder object to create for the Device.

        Multiple device types may use the same item view type if the view displayed for these devices are the same. Most devices will have their own unique views displayed.

        View types should be unique, and are generally defined as static members of the AMAPViewModelProvider class. This keeps them all in the same place and makes it easy to ensure that each identifier is unique.

        覆盖:
        getItemViewType 在类中 ViewModel
        返回:
        An integer representing the type of view for this item.

      • getDetailsFragment

        public android.support.v4.app.Fragment getDetailsFragment()
        Returns a fragment used to display details about the device. This fragment is pushed onto the back stack when the user selects an item from the device list.
        覆盖:
        getDetailsFragment 在类中 ViewModel
        返回:
        a fragment showing device details

      • getScheduleFragment

        public android.support.v4.app.Fragment getScheduleFragment()
        Returns a fragment used to set up a schedule for this device. This fragment is pushed onto the back stack when the user taps the Schedules button from the device details page
        覆盖:
        getScheduleFragment 在类中 ViewModel
        返回:
        a Fragment used to configure schedules for this device

      • getNotificationsFragment

        public android.support.v4.app.Fragment getNotificationsFragment()
        Returns a fragment used to set up notifications for this device. The default implementation returns a generic PropertyNotificationFragment.
        返回:
        a Fragment used to configure property notifications for this device

      • getStatusDrawable

        public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getStatusDrawable()

      • getGridViewSpan

        public int getGridViewSpan()
        Returns the number of elements the device's view should span when displayed in a grid view. The default value is 1. Override this in your device if the device's grid view requires more room.
        覆盖:
        getGridViewSpan 在类中 ViewModel
        返回:
        The number of columns the device's view should span when displayed in a grid

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        覆盖:
